Given that the avatar's position has not changed and my last action was to use a missile, I will assess the current state of the game. 

In the current situation, I still find myself at (row = 10, col = 15), and there’s a heavy concentration of alien sprites in the first row (0, all positions from (0, 0) to (0, 14)). The game board suggests that I have not eliminated any enemies, therefore I need to use a different strategy.

Since using missiles previously did not yield observable effects on the aliens, I need to take a different approach. I will move my avatar towards the left (to (10, 14)) to gain a better position while also avoiding being surrounded by aliens. Positioned at (10, 14), I will be next to the edge, with the potential to engage different threats or move away from crowding enemies.

This action will position my avatar better for the next round and allows me to remain strategic while planning my next move against the alien threats.
